alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 09 at 5:21AM AKDT until August 09 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON AKDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... * AFFECTED AREA...North of the Elliott Highway. * TIMING...From noon AKDT today through this evening. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...East 5 mph or less. * HUMIDITY...As low as 40 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the upper 60s to near 70. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning may cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
